thorax_z_direction: spinal canal axis from T1 to T7
clavicle_x_direction: vec(SC>AC)^(spinal canal axis from T1 to T7)

clavicle_y_direction: (imaging inferosuperior axis)^(Long axis of the distal part of the clavicle, pointing laterally)
clavicle_z_direction: Long axis of the distal part of the clavicle, pointing laterally
